about.title: About Tomorrow’s Brain
about.name: Tomorrow’s Brain (TB) Limited
about.content-1: is an EdTech company offering personalized and adaptive assessment and training on children’s foundational learning abilities, with a specific focus on reading and writing skills.
about.content-2: Over the past 15 years, Professor Shelley Xiuli Tong and her research team at the Speech, Language and Reading Lab of the University of Hong Kong has synergized cognitive-behavioural, educational neuroscience and machine learning approaches to develop and validate cutting-edge educational products tailored to individuals’ diverse learning needs and preferences.
about.content-3: Our pioneering product, the I-DID (Intelligent Dyslexic Interface Design) is an integrated bilingual assessment and learning system that provides 4-to 12-year-old children with a multifactorial learning profiles in Chinese, English, and Cognitive skills, as well as trainings corresponding to their ability matrix.
about.content-4: By leveraging educational neuroscience, intervention science and AI technology, our mission is to develop the customized educational products that guide children to recognize their unique strengths, explore curiosity, and develop a sustainable and thriving future.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content-1: Developing personalized and adaptive assessment and training for all children
mission.content-2: Leveraging AI and brain-based tools to optimize the learning of and teaching for children
mission.content-3: Providing accessible and sustainable education for children with different learning needs
